trust_bottom_green_green_verdict.description: Buyers are happy with this product.
trust_bottom_green_green_verdict.message: Buyers are happy with this product.

trust_bottom_green_orange_verdict.description: Buyers are satisfied with the product, but the seller has negative reviews. It is worth looking for a similar product from another seller.
trust_bottom_green_orange_verdict.message: Buyers are satisfied with the product, but the seller has negative reviews. It is worth looking for a similar product from another seller.

trust_bottom_orange_green_verdict.description: The seller is reliable, but some users did not like this product.
trust_bottom_orange_green_verdict.message: The seller is reliable, but some users did not like this product.

trust_bottom_green_grey_verdict.description: The product is good, but there are not enough reviews about the seller.
trust_bottom_green_grey_verdict.message: The product is good, but there are not enough reviews about the seller.

trust_bottom_grey_green_verdict.description: Buyers are satisfied with this seller, but there are not enough reviews on the product.
trust_bottom_grey_green_verdict.message: Buyers are satisfied with this seller, but there are not enough reviews on the product.

trust_bottom_orange_grey_verdict.description: This product has an average rating, and there are not enough reviews about the seller.
trust_bottom_orange_grey_verdict.message: This product has an average rating, and there are not enough reviews about the seller.

trust_bottom_grey_orange_verdict.description: This product does not have enough reviews. Some buyers are not happy with this seller.
trust_bottom_grey_orange_verdict.message: This product does not have enough reviews. Some buyers are not happy with this seller.

trust_bottom_grey_grey_verdict.description: Not enough reviews about both the product and the seller.
trust_bottom_grey_grey_verdict.message: Not enough reviews about both the product and the seller.

trust_bottom_orange_orange_verdict.description: The seller and the product have average ratings. You can search for a similar product from another seller.
trust_bottom_orange_orange_verdict.message: The seller and the product have average ratings. You can search for a similar product from another seller.

trust_bottom_green_red_verdict.description: The seller has a poor rating, but there were no problems with this product.
trust_bottom_green_red_verdict.message: The seller has a poor rating, but there were no problems with this product.

trust_bottom_red_green_verdict.description: The seller is reliable, but there are not enough positive reviews from buyers about this product.
trust_bottom_red_green_verdict.message: The seller is reliable, but there are not enough positive reviews from buyers about this product.

trust_bottom_red_orange_verdict.description: There are a lot of negative reviews about this product with photos. Most likely the product does not match the description.
trust_bottom_red_orange_verdict.message: There are a lot of negative reviews about this product with photos. Most likely the product does not match the description.

trust_bottom_orange_red_verdict.description: The seller has a low rating. It is worth looking for a similar product from another seller.
trust_bottom_orange_red_verdict.message: The seller has a low rating. It is worth looking for a similar product from another seller.

trust_bottom_red_grey_verdict.description: This product has a low rating, and there are not enough reviews about the seller.
trust_bottom_red_grey_verdict.message: This product has a low rating, and there are not enough reviews about the seller.

trust_bottom_grey_red_verdict.description: There are not enough reviews for this product. Buyers dissatisfied with this seller.
trust_bottom_grey_red_verdict.message: There are not enough reviews for this product. Buyers dissatisfied with this seller.

trust_bottom_red_red_verdict.description: The seller and the product have a low rating. It is worth looking for a similar product from another seller.
trust_bottom_red_red_verdict.message: The seller and the product have a low rating. It is worth looking for a similar product from another seller.
